languages.text: "Увы, нет. Почтенный Гектархиус начинал свое служение в качестве боевого миссионера и давно тяготился спокойной жизнью, положенной человеку его статуса".
"I'm afraid it does not. The esteemed Hectarchius began his service as a battle missionary, and has long grown weary of the peaceful life befitting a man of his status."
languages.original_text: "Увы, нет. Почтенный Гектархиус начинал свое служение в качестве боевого миссионера и давно тяготился спокойной жизнью, положенной человеку его статуса".

traits.locale_text: "I'm afraid it does not. The esteemed Hectarchius began his service as a battle missionary, and has long grown weary of the peaceful life befitting a man of his status."

"I'm afraid it does not. The esteemed Hectarchius began his service as a battle missionary, and has long grown weary of the peaceful life befitting a man of his status."

languages.text: «Me temo que no. El estimado Hectarchius empezó como misionero guerrero y hace mucho que se cansó de la vida pacífica de la que debería poder disfrutar alguien de su categoría».
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid it does not. The esteemed Hectarchius began his service as a battle missionary, and has long grown weary of the peaceful life befitting a man of his status."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que no. El estimado Hectarchius empezó como misionero guerrero y hace mucho que se cansó de la vida pacífica de la que debería poder disfrutar alguien de su categoría».

languages.text: « Je crains que non. À ses débuts, l'honorable Hectarchius était un missionnaire-combattant, et cela faisait des années qu'il se languissait de la vie d'homme d'action qu'il avait dû laisser derrière lui. »
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid it does not. The esteemed Hectarchius began his service as a battle missionary, and has long grown weary of the peaceful life befitting a man of his status."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que non. À ses débuts, l'honorable Hectarchius était un missionnaire-combattant, et cela faisait des années qu'il se languissait de la vie d'homme d'action qu'il avait dû laisser derrière lui. »

languages.text: “我不这么认为。尊敬的赫克塔奇乌斯最初以战斗修士的身份侍奉帝皇，如今他身居高位已久，恐怕早就厌倦了这般风平浪静的生活。”
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid it does not. The esteemed Hectarchius began his service as a battle missionary, and has long grown weary of the peaceful life befitting a man of his status."

traits.locale_text: “我不这么认为。尊敬的赫克塔奇乌斯最初以战斗修士的身份侍奉帝皇，如今他身居高位已久，恐怕早就厌倦了这般风平浪静的生活。”

languages.text: 「念ながら、そうではありません。敬愛されるヘクタールキウスは、戦場での聖務団として奉仕を始め、そして彼のような地位にふさわしい平穏な生活に長い間飽いていたのです」
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid it does not. The esteemed Hectarchius began his service as a battle missionary, and has long grown weary of the peaceful life befitting a man of his status."

traits.locale_text: 「念ながら、そうではありません。敬愛されるヘクタールキウスは、戦場での聖務団として奉仕を始め、そして彼のような地位にふさわしい平穏な生活に長い間飽いていたのです」

languages.text: "Ich fürchte nicht. Der ehrenwerte Hectarchius begann seinen Dienst als Kampfmissionar. Er war des friedlichen Lebens, das sich für einen Mann von seiner Position geziemt, schon lange überdrüssig."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid it does not. The esteemed Hectarchius began his service as a battle missionary, and has long grown weary of the peaceful life befitting a man of his status."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte nicht. Der ehrenwerte Hectarchius begann seinen Dienst als Kampfmissionar. Er war des friedlichen Lebens, das sich für einen Mann von seiner Position geziemt, schon lange überdrüssig."

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki hayır. Saygıdeğer Hectarchius, hizmetine bir çatışma misyoneri olarak başlamıştı ve o statüdeki bir adama yaraşacağı üzere huzurlu bir hayattan pek uzun zamandır bıkmış bir hâldeydi."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid it does not. The esteemed Hectarchius began his service as a battle missionary, and has long grown weary of the peaceful life befitting a man of his status."
